section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: #include <string.h> int bcmp(const char *s1, const char *s2, size_t n);

section.title: Description
section.p: This function compares not more than n characters of the object pointed to by s1 with the object pointed to by s2.
This function is identical to memcmp.

section.title: Returns
section.p: The function returns an integer greater than, equal to or less than zero according to whether the object pointed to by s1 is greater than, equal to or less than the object pointed to by s2.
